text: Yongling, Yong Ling or Yong Mausoleum (永陵) may refer to: *Yongling (Former Shu), the tomb of Wang Jian (847–918) in Chengdu, Sichuan, China *Yongling (Ming dynasty), the tomb of the Jiajing Emperor (1507–1567) in Beijing *Yongling (Qing dynasty), the tomb of descendants of Fuman in Liaoning, China *Yongling (Shaanxi), a historical site in Shaanxi ==See also== *Ling Yong (born 1978), Chinese Paralympic athlete
title: Yongling
